result.eng: We stayed lying on the beach for a while.
result.ga: D'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosa
result.orig: D'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosa
result.html: D'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosaWe stayed lying on the beach for a while.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feaḋ píosaWe stayed lying on the beach for a while.

result.eng: I had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.
result.ga: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agam
result.orig: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agam
result.html: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agamI had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.
result.ponchtml: B'éigean dom mo ḃróga mo ċrios agus gaċ píosa miotal a ḃaint díom maille le pé leaċtanna agus taois a ḃí agamI had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.
